channel.title: TitanPK 562/668 Source || Perfected combat || Pet bosses || Mining/Woodcutting
channel.description:
[img]http://titanpk.site40.net/forum/Themes/princeofdarkness/images/smflogo.png[/img]
The only reason I am releasing this on Mopar is so someone doesn't copy my thread from the other (real) rsps programming forums and take credit for it. Since I know that is what Mopar is known for.
I am deciding to release this because I have recently discovered the leaked Matrix source and will be converting this whole 562 and all of its unique features into the Matrix source :)
If you are sketchy about a virus (since I have released attempted keyloggers in the past) you can scan it yourself and post a virus scan for me since I do not know any of the leading virus scanning software/sites.
CLIENT: http://uppit.com/i91nk3xp3l7d/TitanPK_Client.zip SERVER: http://uppit.com/it3j5aicnrc2/TitanPK_Server.zip CACHE: The cache is downloaded by the client from my DropBox. It is also located in the data folder of the server since the server loads it for various features.
NOTE: NO OTHER CLIENT BUT MINE WILL CONNECT TO MY SERVER. SO DON'T POST HELP THREADS TRYING TO CONNECT SOME OTHER CLIENT TO IT AND THE CLIENT GETTING REJECTED BY THE SERVER.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2uhn5ti.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi41.tinypic.com/120j77s.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2qxsya8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/ru8ug6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/zu0f9j.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/smdm2q.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/296ox1s.jpg[/img]
More Features/Pictures/blahblahblah can be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=523102.0
Features that I have added so far that are not in any of my other threads: -Boss pets (mini bosses that you can get for killing real bosses to show off :P) -User titles that can be customized fully (client sided edit so y'all's friends list still works) -New skill base (credits to Dragonkk's RuneEscape skill class) -Magic has been completely redone from the RS2HD one to my custom variant that works pretty well -Magic is set up to allow easy editing of effects

item.title: TitanPK 562/668 Source || Perfected combat || Pet bosses || Mining/Woodcutting
item.dc:creator: @nb1 nb
item.description:
@nb1 wrote:

lol.
To the kid who cant get his cache extracted, thats a herpy derpy right there.
Go into server file
( Noob who said its 230mb, it has cache inside of it ) and into data then right click the file named cache and " Add to " cache.rar " " and once thats all done just place it at C:\users\username
and rename it TitanPKCache
dirp
derp
darp

Read full topic

item.description:
@Titandino wrote:

The only reason I am releasing this on Mopar is so someone doesn’t copy my thread from the other (real) rsps programming forums and take credit for it. Since I know that is what Mopar is known for.

I am deciding to release this because I have recently discovered the leaked Matrix source and will be converting this whole 562 and all of its unique features into the Matrix source

If you are sketchy about a virus (since I have released attempted keyloggers in the past) you can scan it yourself and post a virus scan for me since I do not know any of the leading virus scanning software/sites.

CLIENT: http://uppit.com/i91nk3xp3l7d/TitanPK_Client.zip
SERVER: http://uppit.com/it3j5aicnrc2/TitanPK_Server.zip
CACHE: The cache is downloaded by the client from my DropBox. It is also located in the data folder of the server since the server loads it for various features.

NOTE: NO OTHER CLIENT BUT MINE WILL CONNECT TO MY SERVER. SO DON’T POST HELP THREADS TRYING TO CONNECT SOME OTHER CLIENT TO IT AND THE CLIENT GETTING REJECTED BY THE SERVER.




ru8ug6.jpg894×219

zu0f9j.jpg757×497


296ox1s.jpg513×665

More Features/Pictures/blahblahblah can be found here:

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Features that I have added so far that are not in any of my other threads:
-Boss pets (mini bosses that you can get for killing real bosses to show off :P)
-User titles that can be customized fully (client sided edit so y’all’s friends list still works)
-New skill base (credits to Dragonkk’s RuneEscape skill class)
-Magic has been completely redone from the RS2HD one to my custom variant that works pretty well
-Magic is set up to allow easy editing of effects
